Name: MPI_MODE_UNIQUE_OPEN
Description:
MPI_MODE_UNIQUE_OPEN is a flag that can be passed to MPI_File_open to specify that the file concerned will not be opened concurrently elsewhere (both inside and outside the MPI environment). MPI_MODE_UNIQUE_OPEN facilitates file access optimisation by informing MPI that it does not need locking for this file.
Other tags are: MPI_MODE_RDONLY, MPI_MODE_RDWR, MPI_MODE_WRONLY, MPI_MODE_CREATE, MPI_MODE_EXCL, MPI_MODE_DELETE_ON_CLOSE, MPI_MODE_SEQUENTIAL and MPI_MODE_APPEND.
